synopsis.text: Office Director-General for Policy Planning, Kojiro Shindo, finds himself in an extraordinary situation when his plane, along with 251 passengers, is engulfed by a colossal, mysterious cube named Kado during takeoff. Inside, a seemingly ordinary man, Yaha-kui zaShunina, emerges and declares his intention to meddle in Japan's domestic affairs. As phones ring simultaneously with zaShunina's message, Shindo takes the initiative to negotiate with the enigmatic being. With the fate of Japan and possibly the entire world at stake, can Shindo successfully navigate these high-stakes negotiations and uncover the true intentions of Yaha-kui zaShunina and the Anisotorons? Discover the intriguing world of Kado in this original CG animation project from Toei Animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
